Grocer Holly:
Welcome to our shop! Did you enjoy your visit to the capital city of Aden? It seems life here is stable and sabe, but in reality there are big troubles in the town. Some nobles and militarists conspire to seize the throne. If we can't get rid of them quickly, the'yll spell disaster for all of us...
But what do I know. Just forget what I've told you.
Come here.
